nio/SSD1306ImageFile.description: Blocks for writing an image file to an SSD1306 OLED screen on Intel Edison. Loads an image file from disk and then displays it to the screen.

file.title: Image File
file.description: Image file on disk. First checks absolute path, then relative to the nio project directory, then relative to the block code file.

default.description: Same list of signals as input.

nio/SSD1306PILImage.description: Blocks for writing a PIL image to an SSD1306 OLED screen on Intel Edison. Displays a PIL Image file from an input signal to the screen.

image.title: PIL Image
image.description: Expression property needs to evaluate to a PIL Image object.

default.description: Any list of signals. Default *image* config is to have a PIL Image in the `image` attribute of the Signal.
Same list of signals as input.
